name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, currently specializing in CI/CD pipelines, cloud deployment, and infrastructure management. Skilled in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, with proven ability to implement robust solutions leveraging **Ansible**, **Jenkins**, and **TeamCity**. Proficient in scripting languages such as **PowerShell** and **Python**, and experienced with database technologies including **SQL**. Talented in monitoring and logging solutions using **Zabbix**, **Grafana**, and **Graylog**, ensuring system reliability and performance. 
Additionally, I bring extensive knowledge of AI/ML-powered platforms and compliance-driven development, aligning with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, alongside a strong background in MLOps using modern orchestration tools. My technical prowess is complemented by 13 years of engaging effectively with cross-functional teams in high-stakes environments like healthcare and finance.
